column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A garbage truck crashed into a waterway. ------This incident occurred at 1:40 pm on October 5
column5: along the 30-meter road in Prey Sar commune
column6: Dangkor district. Phnom Penh.------According to media reports
column7: he was driving from the road to the west of Prey Sar road and overtaking another car
column8: when he ditched into the ditch to avoid hitting an oncoming vehicle.------

column2: the company called a crane to hoist the truck out of the water. There were no casualties.------By Proeung Visal------source DAP
